# Covariates plots

This Covariates section provides flexibility to visualize the covariates, such as Age, group, Genotype showing here. This table contains several columns including the Significance, p-value, and FDR for each covariates listed. Users can also adjust the covariates and cutoffs on the left.

```{r, echo=FALSE}
library(knitr)
data(mtcars)
kable(mtcars[1:5,], caption = "A test table")
```
